thread.title: Fragmob Announces Partnership With Trinity Software
thread.title_full: Fragmob Announces Partnership With Trinity Software

author: admin
title: Fragmob Announces Partnership With Trinity Software
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 5:34 PM   Fragmob 
SAN DIEGO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/22/15 -- Fragmob, Direct Selling's mobile technology innovator, today announced its partnership with Trinity Software, Inc., a software development and consulting company and creator of the Firestorm速 business management software solution for the Direct Sales industry. 
Leveraging Trinity Software, which includes recent enhancements to the Firestorm速 Platform including configurable order discount schedules, free product schedules and gift certificates, Fragmob clients will now have a way to streamline the integration aspect of their direct sales business and mobile solution. 
"Trinity Software is proud to partner with Fragmob. Our solutions are not just for startups, and we are pleased to expand the reach of Firestorm速 to Fragmob's global clients," said Solomon McCluster, Senior Software Sales Consultant at Trinity Software. 
As a leading mobile platform provider, Fragmob, along with Trinity Software, will be able to offer their joint corporate clients a faster implementation process. This partnership will allow clients who use Fragmob as a mobile platform developer and Trinity Software as a backoffice solution to have their systems work seamlessly together. 
"Fragmob's philosophy centers on the idea that integration and cooperation among fragmented technologies will create an ecosystem of success in the Direct Sales space," said Michael McMillan, VP of Customer Experience at Fragmob. "We are very pleased to have Trinity Software join the Fragmob initiative of building this technological ecosystem for our customers around the globe." 
About Fragmob An international mobile sales automation software provider, Fragmob instigates action through technology that enables Direct Selling companies to realize the benefits of a powerful mobile solution. Servicing hundreds of thousands of users in more than 30 countries, the Fragmob mobile platform drives Direct Selling sales reps towards the most focused, effective actions for their business in real-time and delivers actionable metrics so clients and users can achieve higher sales in less time. Visit Fragmob at http://fragmob.com/ and on Twitter at @Fragmob . 
About Trinity Software With more than 23 years of experience, 800+ successful client deployments and a substantial active client list of both MLM and party plan companies, Trinity Software is an industry leader with its Firestorm速 Platform. Trinity Software is flexible, scalable, affordable, reliable and can easily support the rapid growth of any company. The more you discover about Trinity Software, the more you will understand why they are fast becoming the provider of choice for MLM and party plan companies large or small. Visit Trinity Software at www.trinitysoft.net . Contact:
